import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { Container, Row, Col, Button, Form } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Trash, PlusLg } from "react-bootstrap-icons"; import { Formik, FieldArray } from 'formik'; import * as Yup from 'yup'; import { product as Prod } from '../data/product'; const EditProduct = () => { const { goods } = useParams(); const product = Prod.filter(item => (item.code === goods))[0]; let initialize = { code: product.code, title: product.title, description: product.description, coverImg: product.coverImg, category: product.category, sku: product.sku } return (
